name: Kung Rage!
description:
Kung Rage is a Streets of Rage clone created with Unreal Engine 4 and C++ and made for Xbox One using UWP.

This was a team project of 5 members and my role was Gameplay Programmer.

Contributions:

  1. Player Behaviour such as punches, kicks and throwing knives
  2. Enemy AI behaviours (3 Grunts and 1 Boss)
  3. Pick Ups (Health, Gold and 1-Ups)
  4. Player and Enemy Animations
  5. 2 player functionality
  6. Character selection

This game uses Streets of Rage assets and they DO NOT belong to us and are used for educational purposes.
